tigase.disteventbus

Interface EventBus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalEventBus

    public interface EventBus

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHandler(String name, String xmlns, EventHandler handler)
      Registers handler to receive events with given name and namespace.
      void fire(Element event) 
      void removeHandler(String name, String xmlns, EventHandler handler) 

    • Method Detail

      • addHandler

        void addHandler(String name,
                String xmlns,
                EventHandler handler)
        Registers handler to receive events with given name and namespace.
        Parameters:
        name - name of events. Can be null, then handler will be received all events with given xmlns.
        xmlns - namespace of events.
        handler - event handler.

      • fire

        void fire(Element event)

      • removeHandler

        void removeHandler(String name,
                   String xmlns,
                   EventHandler handler)
